name: Primary Care AI Futures: Reproducibility Capsule
description: Complete computational reproducibility capsule for 'Artificial Intelligence and the Future of Primary Care: Social Vulnerability Determines Impact' by Basu et al. (2026). Includes temporal validation, cost-effectiveness analysis, and scenario simulations.

authors.name: Zirui Song
authors.affiliation: Massachusetts General Hospital, Harvard Medical School

authors.affiliation: Brigham and Women's Hospital, Harvard Medical School

authors.name: Bruce E. Landon
authors.affiliation: Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, Harvard Medical School

authors.name: Russell S. Phillips
authors.affiliation: Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, Harvard Medical School

data_sources.name: Medical Expenditure Panel Survey (MEPS)
data_sources.note: Synthetic data provided; real data requires separate download
